description:
C.bad4_call(address).addr (tests/detectors/missing-zero-check/0.7.6/missing_zero_address_validation.sol#33) lacks a zero-check on :
		- addr.call{value: msg.value}() (tests/detectors/missing-zero-check/0.7.6/missing_zero_address_validation.sol#34)

C.bad3_transfer(address).addr (tests/detectors/missing-zero-check/0.7.6/missing_zero_address_validation.sol#28) lacks a zero-check on :
		- addr.transfer(msg.value) (tests/detectors/missing-zero-check/0.7.6/missing_zero_address_validation.sol#29)

C.bad0_set_owner(address).new_owner (tests/detectors/missing-zero-check/0.7.6/missing_zero_address_validation.sol#15) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = new_owner (tests/detectors/missing-zero-check/0.7.6/missing_zero_address_validation.sol#16)

C.bad2_transfer(address).addr (tests/detectors/missing-zero-check/0.7.6/missing_zero_address_validation.sol#24) lacks a zero-check on :
		- addr.transfer(msg.value) (tests/detectors/missing-zero-check/0.7.6/missing_zero_address_validation.sol#25)

C.bad1_send(address).addr (tests/detectors/missing-zero-check/0.7.6/missing_zero_address_validation.sol#19) lacks a zero-check on :
		- addr.send(msg.value) (tests/detectors/missing-zero-check/0.7.6/missing_zero_address_validation.sol#20)
		- addr.send(msg.value) (tests/detectors/missing-zero-check/0.7.6/missing_zero_address_validation.sol#21)
